typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		MANDT as string,
		MATNR as string,
		SPRAS as string,
		ERNAM as string,
		LAEDA as string,
		MTART as string,
		MATKL as string,
		MEINS as string,
		BEGRU as string,
		MAKTX as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> RawSapMaterialData
RawSapMaterialData select(mapColumn(
		Number = MATNR,
		ChangeDate = LAEDA
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectForHub
RawSapMaterialData select(mapColumn(
		Number = MATNR,
		Language = SPRAS,
		CreatedBy = ERNAM,
		ChangeDate = LAEDA,
		MaterialType = MTART,
		MaterialClass = MATKL,
		UnitOfMeasure = MEINS,
		Description = MAKTX
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectForSatellite
SelectForSatellite filter(Language == 'E') ~> EnglishLanguage
SelectForHub derive(Source = 'SAP') ~> AddedSource
